tasks.name: Brainstorm Risk Mitigation Strategies
tasks.description: Brainstorming strategies to reduce the likelihood or impact of hazards

completeness.description: Come up with 1 strategy to mitigate the identified risks

tasks.name: Transform the strategy into a safety requirement
tasks.description: help users to transform the strategy into a safety requirement

completeness.description: Transform the strategy into 2 safety requirement

quality.description: The safety requirement must be specific, measurable, achievable, relevant, and time-bound

presentation.description: The safety requirement must show the specific, measurable, achievable, relevant, and time-bound

StepOverview.description: This step will help users to write safety functions and requirements of a product based on risk analysis

risk.description: The product may cause electric shock during operation due to faulty wiring.

function_statement.Specific: The product must ground all exposed metal components that come into contact with users or electrical circuits.
function_statement.Measurable: The grounding system must ensure that electrical resistance between each metal component and the ground is no greater than 0.5 ohms, as verified by an electrical continuity test.
function_statement.Achievable: The grounding and insulation system will be implemented using industry-standard materials and processes in compliance with IEC 60364 standards.
function_statement.Relevant: This grounding and insulation system is required to prevent electric shock and ensure user safety during operation, particularly in environments where electrical exposure is possible.
function_statement.Time-bound: The grounding system must be fully tested and operational before product release, with final verification to be completed by the end of Q3 2024.

safety_requirement.verification: Conduct electrical testing to verify that grounding and insulation meet safety standards (e.g., IEC 60335).
